name: CSS 3
title: This is a quick reference cheat sheet for CSS goodness, listing selector syntax, properties, units and other useful bits of information.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This is a quick reference cheat sheet for CSS goodness, listing selector syntax, properties, units and other useful bits of information.

cards.title: Introduction
cards.body: CSS is rich in capabilities and is more than simply laying out pages.

cards.title: Introduction
cards.body: Support multiple classes on one element.

cards.title: Text color
Background
Animation
cards.code:
animation: 300ms linear 0s infinite;

animation: bounce 300ms linear infinite;

cards.title: Comment
Flex layout
Grid layout
Variable & Counter
Combinators
cards.back:
All p tags
_one level deep in div_

cards.title: Properties
cards.body:
| `font-weight:` | \<number> / bold / normal | | `font-style:` | italic / normal | | `text-decoration:` | underline /
none |

cards.title: Properties
cards.body:
| `text-align:` | left / right
center / justify | | `text-transform:` | capitalize / uppercase / lowercase |

cards.title: Case
Named color
Other
Properties
cards.body:
| `background-color:` | See: [Colors](#css-colors) | | `background-image:` | url(...) | | `background-position:` | left/center/right
top/center/bottom | | `background-size:` | cover X Y | | `background-clip:` | border-box
padding-box
content-box | | `background-repeat:` | no-repeat
repeat-x
repeat-y | | `background-attachment:` | scroll/fixed/local | {.left-text}

cards.title: Examples
Examples
Examples
Properties
cards.back: none / forwards / backwards / both / initial / inherit

cards.title: Example
Container
cards.code:
flex-direction: row; /* ltr - default */
flex-direction: row-reverse; /* rtl */
flex-direction: column; /* top-bottom */
flex-direction: column-reverse; /* bottom-top */

cards.title: Container
cards.code:
flex-wrap: nowrap; /* one-line */
flex-wrap: wrap; /* multi-line */

cards.title: Container
cards.code:
align-items: flex-start; /* vertical-align to top */
align-items: flex-end; /* vertical-align to bottom */
align-items: center; /* vertical-align to center */
align-items: stretch; /* same height on all (default) */

cards.title: Container
cards.code:
justify-content: flex-start; /* [xxx        ] */
justify-content: center; /* [    xxx    ] */
justify-content: flex-end; /* [        xxx] */
justify-content: space-between; /* [x    x    x] */
justify-content: space-around; /* [ x   x   x ] */
justify-content: space-evenly; /* [  x  x  x  ] */

cards.title: Child
Child
cards.code:
align-self: flex-start; /* left */
margin-left: auto; /* right */

cards.title: Vertical center
Vertical center (2)
Mobile layout
Mobile layout
cards.body: A fixed-height top bar and a dynamic-height content area.

cards.title: Table-like
Table-like
cards.body: This creates columns that have different widths, but size accordingly according to the circumstances.

cards.title: Grid Gap
minmax() Function
CSS grid-row-gap
cards.body: Any legal length value, like px or %. 0 is the default value

cards.title: Justify Items
CSS grid-template-areas
Justify Self
Justify Self
cards.body: The grid items are positioned to the right (end) of the row.

cards.title: Align Items
Using counters
Using counters
Scrollbar smooth
cards.body: [Click me](#css-getting-started), the page will scroll smoothly to Getting started

cards.title: container queries(size)
container qeries(style)
container units
cards.body:
• The units are cqw (“container query width”),
• cqh (“container query height”),
• cqi (“container query inline”),
• cqb (“container query block”),
• cqmin (smaller of cqi and cqb),
• and cqmax (larger of cqi and cqb)

scoping
cascade layers
logical properties

color mixing
margin trim
text wrapping
subgrid
Also see
cards.body:
• [frontendmasters.com ](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/what-you-need-to-know-about-modern-css-spring-2024-edition/)
• [CSS selectors cheatsheet](https://frontend30.com/css-selectors-cheatsheet/) _(frontend30.com)_
• [MDN: Using CSS flexbox](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Guide/CSS/Flexible_boxes)
• [Ultimate flexbox cheatsheet](http://www.sketchingwithcss.com/samplechapter/cheatsheet.html)
• [GRID: A simple visual cheatsheet](http://grid.malven.co/)
• [CSS Tricks: A Complete Guide to Grid](https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/complete-guide-grid/)
• [Browser support](https://caniuse.com/#feat=css-grid)
